targets.expr: 1 - sum by (node_name) (node_filesystem_avail_bytes{fstype=~"ext[234]|btrfs|xfs|zfs", node_name=~"$nodes"}) / sum by (node_name) (node_filesystem_size_bytes{fstype=~"ext[234]|btrfs|xfs|zfs", node_name=~"$nodes"})
sum by(container) (container_memory_usage_bytes{job="kubernetes-nodes-cadvisor", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"})
sum by(container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", job="kube-state-metrics", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"})
